title: Band, 15th or 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidery stitches using silk: double running (parallel rows of double running for grid of background) on plain weave
description: Band fragment showing mermaids, cupids and fantastic heads on a floral vine. In red silk on linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 15th or 16th century.
15th or 16th century. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidery stitches using silk: double running (parallel rows of double running for grid of background) on plain weave. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-108.
